title: How to change the camera lens of my smartphone - Quora

response.answer_text: No, you can not. But what you can do is using an add on lens. If you are using iPhone or Pixel then buy a Moment lens. Here are the links. For telephoto: New Tele 58mm Lens for iPhone, Pixel, and: Amazon.in: Electronics For Anamorphic: Moment Anamorphic Lens For Wide: Amazon.in: Electronics If you are using other Android then you can buy other clip-on lenses. But don’t but cheaper ones. They will give you tones of vignette and chromatic aberration. Or you can buy a Beastgrip Pro - The Most Versatile Tool for Phoneographers. It will give you the ability to adapt Canon EF lenses on to your smartphone. It can give you DSLR like depth of field.
